ValidationRule.description: Inactive Account cannot be Linked. Only "OSS Support" or "System Admin" have the ability to do so.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.NS_StatusIndicator__c, 'Inactive'), NOT(OR($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator',$Profile.Name = 'NS Integration User', $Profile.Name = 'OSS Support')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Inactive Account cannot be associated. Please contact "OSS Support" or "System Admin"
